name: Rhythm Jungle
description:
The Jungle Musical!

Starring the Non-Shedding Bunny and Nerdy Bear!

Tired of the note and keyboard? Let’s try the Rhythm Jungle!

It’s a fun and adorable rhythm simulation game. You can move along with the amazing rhythm during the gameplay!

The bear’s daily life in the jungle has been developed into nine chapters. The game will let the player overcome the challenges in each chapter from a brand-new perspective.

The control is simple for players at every age. It also comes with advanced mode for skillful players. Let’s learn and play to help the bunny and achieve the highest score!

Putting on the headphone and enjoy the rhythm in the jungle. Hope these cute animals can bring you more enjoyment!
